name: S.E.R.A - R.W. Division
description:
A small game me and my team created so that we could participate into UE4 Mega Jam. The topic given was "Reality is often inaccurate". Although we tried to do our best but there are some gaps

To the players and critiques -> We are noobs at ue4 (at the time of making of this game) and this is our first game jam ever.
